item.description:
The last 2 weeks have been rained out and this weekend's weather is questionable but let's be optimistic.

We'll connect with the Singles Event group at 9 am this Saturday at Conard. Everyone is welcome as usual.

Meet at the center bleachers if you don't otherwise recognize anyone from the two groups.
If it has rained within the last 2-3 hours prior to the Meetup, you can assume the courts are still wet but you can call me at 860-559-7983 for a current status.

Finally, the Single Event is playing again at Conard on Monday, 9/15 at 5:30.

Thanks.

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: Another Attempt at Tennis
